snippet: The campaign of Newt Gingrich was pushed to defend remarks he made about food stamps that some bloggers and news Web sites interpreted as racially offensive.
abstract: The campaign of Newt Gingrich was pushed to defend remarks he made about food stamps that some bloggers and news Web sites interpreted as racially offensive.
lead_paragraph: MEREDITH, N.H. -- Newt Gingrich's campaign was pushed to defend remarks he made about food stamps that some bloggers and news Web sites interpreted as racially offensive.

headline.main: Gingrich Campaign Defends Remarks on Food Stamps

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
